pr_title: feat(Auth): Adds the ability to specify a custom browser for web UI sign in/out

timeline.message: Adds the ability to specify a custom browser for web UI sign in/out

timeline.bodyText: Instead of setting signOutGlobally to false, should we be getting this from the passed in options variable?
timeline.author: richardmcclellan

replies.bodyText: In short, no per our conversation :)
replies.author: TrekSoft

replies.bodyText: For sign out locally (which this helper method is) it needs to be set to false with invalidateTokens set to true. The isGlobalSignOut option is examined in the main method which uses this helper method.
replies.author: TrekSoft

timeline.author: richardmcclellan
